summary: Makes the quest A Return to Your Roots less tedious.  Adds a dead alchemist near Sinderion's Lab with the 30 Crimson Nirnroot.  He did the collecting so you don't have to.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[/center][center][size=5]Easy A Return To Your Roots[/size]

[size=3]This mod makes the quest to obtain Crimson Nirnroot less tedious.  No more searching Blackreach for hours.  

A dead alchemist has been added to the pit near Sinderion's Lab.  He has the samples needed to complete the quest.[/size][/center]
author: Corpsehatch

files.name: Easy Return To Your Roots
files.changelogHtml: Added Polish translation from user MaskedRPGFan
